## Overview

Next Word Predictor Application suggests the most probable word after entering a word. Only words in English are allowed.

## Instructions

- Enter a word or phrase, in English, into the textbox titled "Input".

- Wait a split second.

- A "suggested next word" will appear below the textbox.

- The word or phrase entered will appear below the "suggested next word".
